group_1.narration: With the assistance of Professor Satomi, who@conducts research on Magical Girls, we have@decided to embark once more on an endeavor@to inform everyone about Magical Girls.
Until now, we had hoped that by shouldering@the anger and sorrow of the Witches' victims@ourselves, the three of us could serve as a@source of healing for them.
But the number of Magical Girls who have endured@such suffering has dwindled to six, including us,@and the situation shows no sign of improvement.
That's why, we have decided to return to our@roots once more and work towards fostering@mutual understanding between Magical Girls@and the populace.
However, anything we do would only be@perceived as a staged performance in@the eyes of the Eradicators.@That's why Professor Satomi has stepped in@to assist us.
If he can help us dispel the misconceptions@surrounding us and nurture the seeds of trust@once again, then it will be our time@to shine as Magical Girls.
This time, let's ensure they truly understand@what Magical Girls are really like.

group_1.narration: "Ever since the accident at the Yukuni City event,@there has been a surge in new accidents@and tragedies in town."
"A police investigation into causality is underway,@but so far all incidents and accidents have been@reported as unrelated."

"Since the damage is particularly concentrated@among teenagers, public elementary and junior@high schools have been asking their students to@leave school in groups and requesting they@refrain from going out at night."

group_1.textCenter: (I can't help but wonder if it might be the work@of my fellowmen...)

group_1.textRight: What the hell did you call me here for?@Finally decide to kill me or something?
